mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Board(id, locationNo, category, date, title, content) VALUES(#{id}, #{locationNo}, #{category}, #{date}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT b.boardNo, b.id, b.locationNo, b.date, b.title, b.content, l.locationName FROM Board b INNER JOIN Location l ON b.locationNo = l.locationNo WHERE b.category = 1
SELECT b.id , b.locationNo, b.date, b.title, b.content, l.locationName FROM Board b INNER JOIN Location l ON b.locationNo = l.locationNo WHERE b.boardNo = #{boardNo} AND b.category = 1
